subject: Umpires
Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: The World Series umpires know what pine tar looks like, even on a bare hand, and there is no reason to think they let Kenny Rogers get away with a dirty act in Game 2.
snippet: The World Series umpires know what pine tar looks like, even on a bare hand, and there is no reason to think they let Kenny Rogers get away with a dirty act in Game 2.
